page.title: 16Education
page.content: The present school building was erected in 1964.The old building had proved too small. The Infant Class had been taught in the Village Hall for some time. The present school consists of three classrooms,one designed for infants with its own toilet area at the east side of the school, and two adjoining classrooms at the west side. In between there are separate boys,girls and staff toilets, a staff room and an Activity Hall which is also used as a dining area.Meals are cooked in a kitchen by the cook. Because of the low numbers, only convenience foods stored in a deep_freeze are made. There is a metalled play area in front of the school and a large grass playing area behind.
